author: mmidy
msg: Bugzilla 1102 :Fix Null Pointer Exception. Thanks to rainer@gtt.me-park.com.

author: morten
msg: Fix for the abbreviated descendant axis in combination with the child axis.
The problem with this combination manifested itself in test axis82 and
Sun's tests zv038. This bug was a regression introduced after other fixes

author: morten
msg: Made a global data-structure static (it should have been in the first place)
to make instanciation of this class a bit faster. Also, made it implement
the Externalizable interface to ensure that the DOM can be serialized.

author: morten
msg: Fix for a regression in a string-value function in the DOM.
The string returned from <xsl:value-of select="/"/> included PIs.
